title: Which is better, a B.Ed. or an MA after graduation? - Quora

response.answer_text: This basically depend on your need. 1.If you want a job early,then you must go for b.ed and if you do b.ed from a good college or university , u will get placed from the college itself with an average salary of 30k which is not bad. 2.If you want to study further,then go for m.a as there is no job directly after m.a you have to go for bed even after doing m.a if you want a teaching job or have to prepare for govt.job exam.
If You are teaching primary to high school student then B.Ed enough. Teaching II PUC , College level you need MA is required,I think. MA is Good I think.
